properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA out 20 nm ...including Grays Reef National Marine Sanctuary; Coastal waters from Edisto Beach SC to Savannah GA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 3:11AM EST until February 22 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to 1/4 NM or less. For the Small Craft Advisory,
northeast winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 4
to 7 ft expected.

* WHERE...Edisto Beach to Savannah out 20 NM and Savannah to
Altamaha Sound out 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM EST this
morning. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 PM this evening
to 1 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY
